scripts.git-delete-merged-branches: git branch | grep -v "master" | grep -v "dev" | xargs git branch -D
scripts.all: pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.all:packages: pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.all:fresh: pnpm clone-submodules && pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.publish-packages: pnpm all:packages && pnpm changeset version && pnpm changeset publish && sh ./tag.sh
